metadata.dc:author: Illana Esteban, Emilio
metadata.dc:description: The blades of a scalpel form an extensive set of stainless steel cutting sheets which have a fenestration where they link to a scalpel's handle comfortably; these handles can be small, number 3 or large, number 4.
metadata.dc:title: El bisturí: hojas. Instrumentos de corte e incisión.
[Cutting and incision tools: the scalpel: blades].
